objects.text:
• Polycarbonate Hardsided
• 8-Wheel Premium Design
• Scratch-Resistant Finish
• Stylish Forest Sunray Color

product_details.name: MOKOBARA The Em Cabin Polycarbonate Hardsided Luggage | 8 Wheel Trolley Bag | Travel Suitcase for Men & Women (4AM Forest Sunray (Limited Edition))…
product_details.description: Item Weight: 6.6 pounds. Body Material: Polycarbonate. Finish Type: Glossy. Product Dimensions: 21.65 x 12.99 x 8.82 inches. Country of Origin: China. Color Name: 4AM Forest Sunray (Limited Edition). Material Type: Polycarbonate (PC). Size: One Size.

banner_details:
This banner presents a sleek and modern travel advertisement design centered around a premium suitcase. The layout features a dark forest green background accented with bold geometric shapes and soft circular gradients for depth. The "heading" captures attention with large, bold white sans-serif text, while the "tagline" underneath uses a square, stencil-style font in a vibrant mustard yellow to emphasize exclusivity. A product feature list under "description" provides concise travel case highlights in a clean white text. The price, labeled with "price", stands out in bold yellow, followed by a rounded-corner call-to-action button. A prominent suitcase image under "product_image" completes the composition with realistic appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Forest Green (#1E2D23)
- Deep Olive (#233028)
- Dark Charcoal (#131C17)
- Mustard Yellow (#DEB035)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern suitcase with a dark forest green body (#2F372D) that exudes sophistication and durability. A bold, contrasting mustard yellow zipper line (#F1C40F) cuts through the middle, adding vibrancy and acting as a visual highlight. The handle and wheels are coated in deep black (#1A1A1A), enhancing the premium appeal. The brand label appears in black with white text (#FFFFFF), maintaining clarity and contrast. For an advertisement banner, a color palette combining Forest Green (#2F372D), Mustard Yellow (#F1C40F), Charcoal Black (#1A1A1A), and White (#FFFFFF) can vividly showcase the product while preserving its stylish, urban tone.
